refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks whether a given named constant exists

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns &true; if the named constant given by name has been defined, &false; otherwise.

example.title: Checking Constants
example.programlisting:
<?php
/* Note the use of quotes, this is important.  This example is checking 
 * if the string 'CONSTANT' is the name of a constant named CONSTANT */
if (defined('CONSTANT')) {
    echo CONSTANT;
}
?>

note.para: If you're wanting to see if a variable exists, use isset as defined only applies to constants. If you're wanting to see if a function exists, use function_exists.

refsect1.para: See also define, constant, get_defined_constants, function_exists, and the section on Constants.
